metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3546 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.11, 2.5.x before 2.5.7, 2.6.xbefore 2.6.4, and 2.7.x before 2.7.1 does not enforce certain capabilityrequirements in (1) notes/index.php and (2) user/edit.php, which allowsremote attackers to obtain potentially sensitive username and courseinformation via a modified URL.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
